name: iinllyconn

body.origin:
|- wcel(cii, cnlly(cconn))
-| wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn))
-| wcel(cii, cnlly(csconn))
body.pretty:
⊢ II ∈ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ N-Locally(SConn)⊆ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ II ∈ N-Locally(SConn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cii, cnlly(cconn))
-| wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn))
-| wcel(cii, cnlly(csconn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ II ∈ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ N-Locally(SConn)⊆ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ II ∈ N-Locally(SConn)

body.origin:
|- wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn))
-| wss(csconn, cconn)
-| wi(wss(csconn, cconn), wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn)))
body.pretty:
⊢ N-Locally(SConn)⊆ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ SConn ⊆ Conn
⊣ (SConn ⊆ Conn → N-Locally(SConn)⊆ N-Locally(Conn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cii, cnlly(cconn))
-| wcel(cii, cnlly(csconn))
-| wss(csconn, cconn)
-| wi(wss(csconn, cconn), wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ II ∈ N-Locally(Conn)
⊣ II ∈ N-Locally(SConn)
⊣ SConn ⊆ Conn
⊣ (SConn ⊆ Conn → N-Locally(SConn)⊆ N-Locally(Conn))

body.origin:
|- wss(csconn, cconn)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csconn), wcel(cv(hs0), cconn))
-| diffsc(hs0, csconn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cconn)
body.pretty:
⊢ SConn ⊆ Conn
⊣ (hs0 ∈ SConn → hs0 ∈ Conn)
⊣ d(hs0, SConn)
⊣ d(hs0, Conn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cii, cnlly(cconn))
-| wcel(cii, cnlly(csconn))
-| wi(wss(csconn, cconn), wss(cnlly(csconn), cnlly(cconn)))

-| diffsc(hs0, cconn)
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ II ∈ N-Locally(SConn)

⊣ (hs0 ∈ SConn → hs0 ∈ Conn)
⊣ d(hs0, SConn)
⊣ d(hs0, Conn)

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(cv(hs0), csconn), wcel(cv(hs0), cconn), wcel(cv(hs0), cpconn))
stmt.pretty: syl(hs0 ∈ SConn, hs0 ∈ Conn, hs0 ∈ PConn)

body.origin:

body.pretty:
